May 18, 2016

Program Purpose: To help save energy and money by teaching how much appliances cost to run.

Thank you for downloading our app! Energy Savings has one main purpose: to help you save energy! Use the Energy Calculator to get started.

Type in:
	1. The power draw of your appliance
	2. How long you use it every day
	3. Your monthly cost per kWh of electricity

It will calculate the operating cost of that appliance!

You can also find nice tips on how to save energy.
Select the Tips and Tricks Button and choose a topic to get started.
